name: My AI Brain
description:
You have just created an AI, but he is stupid. Hoards of enemies are comming to kill him, so YOU must make his brain, but make it SMART. 

You tell him what to do, and he plays for you.

How to play:
  • Click on the brain icon to open the Brain Interface
  • Click on the conditions and tasks on the left panel to create new blocks
  • Drag the connecting spots from a Condition block (the green one means the condition is true, the red one is for false) to a Task block or another Condition block.
  • Modify the various parameters like the "greater" and "smaller" sign
  • Watch your AI move, shoot and survive!!
[Fullscreen recommended]

Made for the WOWIE Game Jam 4.0 (3.5 days)

!!!!KNOWN ISSUES!!!!
  • The game some times stops working when you close a block,
  • When you delete a Condition block or a connection between 2 Condition blocks, any of its linked Condition blocks wont be executed :(
  • You can heal yourself and recharge indefinetly XD
Follow me on itch and on https://mwn02.newgrounds.com/ to be notified when the final version comes out!!
